matter.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a subject or situation that you have to think about or deal with

matter.translation[0].definitions[1].def: the material that everything in the universe is made of, including solids, liquids, and gases
matter.translation[0].definitions[2].def: a substance that consists of waste material, solid material etc
matter.translation[0].definitions[3].def: a yellow or white substance in wounds or next to your eye
